properties.entry: SELECT M.PAY_ID , M.OD_ID , (SELECT P_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT P WHERE D.P_ID = P.P_ID) P_NAME , OD_COUNT , TOTAL_PAY , OD_STATUS , TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE,'YY/MM/DD') PAY_DATE , NVL(INVOICE_ID, 0) INVOICE_ID FROM TB_MEM_PAYMENT M JOIN TB_MEM_ORDER_DETAIL D ON(M.OD_ID = D.OD_ID) JOIN TB_MEM_INVOICE I ON(M.PAY_ID = I.PAY_ID) WHERE D.P_ID = (SELECT P_ID FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_SELLER USING (SEL_NO) WHERE SEL_NO = ?)
